Reveal.caption: The fastest of our racing bikes, born to win.

1.smallText: Its incredible performance pedigree is the result of meticulous development, carried out hand-in-hand with our professional riders

Cofidis.text: If there were to be just one bike, this would be it. The ultimate racing machine, the fastest bike to ever come out of our workshops.

reasons.1: Exceptional lightness: a fully-built, race-ready bike weighing just 7 kg
reasons.2: Aerodynamically-optimized frame and components thanks to in-depth wind tunnel testing, making for very, very fast riding.
reasons.3: A fully-integrated carbon cockpit with optimized aerodynamics and perfect ergonomics for precise handling.

Why.largeText: The 795 BladeRS was designed to win, and it answered its calling on its very first UCI World Tour
Why.smallText: Throughout the development we were able to count on the professional riders of the Cofidis team to help us fine-tune the 795 BladeRS.
